resources.headerSubtitle: Useful information and guides for using ChainElect
resources.faqSubtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about ChainElect.

tutorials.title: How to connect your crypto wallet

faqs.question: How do I register on the platform?
faqs.answer: You can register by providing your email and creating a password. Then follow the verification steps.

faqs.question: What is blockchain and why is it used for voting?
faqs.answer: Blockchain is a decentralized technology that ensures your votes are secure and cannot be tampered with.

faqs.question: Can I verify if my vote was recorded correctly?
faqs.answer: Yes, after voting you will receive a unique hash code to verify your vote in the system.

faqs.question: How long will voting take?
faqs.answer: The voting process is quick and takes only a few minutes. Make sure you have valid identification ready.

faqs.question: What are the voting requirements?
faqs.answer: You must be at least 18 years old and have valid identification.

register.title: Register

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: We are committed to your privacy. Please read this policy to understand how we use your data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect the following user information:
items: Personal information such as name, email, and phone number.
Device data including IP address, browser type, and operating system.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.description: Your data is used for the following purposes:
items: To ensure security and identity verification during voting
To contact you regarding issues or questions

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We use the latest technologies to protect your personal information, including:

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: As a platform user, you have the following rights:

contact.description: If you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us:

termsOfUse.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform.

generalTerms.title: General Terms
generalTerms.description: By using the platform you agree to these terms and agree to follow the rules outlined below:
items: The platform is intended for lawful use only.
Users are responsible for providing accurate information.
Distribution of illegal, harmful, or infringing content is prohibited.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: As a platform user you agree to:
items: Not use the platform for fraud or illegal activities
Maintain the confidentiality of your access credentials
Report suspicious activities related to your account

platformUsage.title: Platform Usage
platformUsage.description: We reserve the right to terminate your access in the following cases:

liabilityLimitation.description: The platform is provided 'as is' without warranties. We are not responsible for:
items: Improper use of the platform by users

amendments.title: Terms Amendments
amendments.description: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Changes will be published on this page, and your continued use will be considered acceptance of the new terms.

walletGuide.title: How to Connect Your Wallet
walletGuide.subtitle: Follow these steps to securely connect your crypto wallet
walletGuide.securityNotice: Secure integration with leading crypto wallets

steps.title: Install Wallet
steps.content: Ensure you have a crypto wallet like MetaMask installed

steps.title: Login to Profile
steps.content: Log in to your ChainElect platform account

steps.title: Initiate Connection
steps.content: Click the 'Connect Wallet' button in the top right corner

steps.title: Select Wallet
steps.content: Choose your wallet from the list of supported options

steps.title: Approve Connection
steps.content: Confirm the connection through your wallet interface

steps.title: Confirmation
steps.content: You'll receive visual confirmation after successful connection

infoBox.title: Important Information
infoBox.content: If experiencing issues, verify your wallet is updated and you've selected the correct network (Ethereum Sepolia). The connection is completely secure and does not provide access to your funds.

resultsGuide.title: How to View Results
resultsGuide.subtitle: Follow these steps to verify voting results

steps.title: Login to Profile
steps.content: Access your account using the login form

steps.title: View Results
steps.content: See current results updated in real-time

steps.title: Detailed Statistics
steps.content: Analyze candidate statistics and voting details

votingGuide.title: How to Vote
votingGuide.subtitle: Follow these steps to vote successfully on ChainElect
votingGuide.intro: Learn to use our platform for secure and transparent voting

steps.title: Registration
steps.content: Register on the platform with a valid email and password

steps.title: Login
steps.content: Access your account using the login button

steps.title: Navigation
steps.content: Select the 'Voting' section from the navigation menu

steps.title: Candidate Review
steps.content: Review available candidates and their programs

steps.title: Voting
steps.content: Click the 'Vote' button next to your chosen candidate

steps.title: Confirmation
steps.content: Confirm your choice. Your vote will be recorded on the blockchain

steps.title: Verification
steps.content: Check your vote status in the 'Results' section

ctaSection.title: Ready to Vote?
ctaSection.content: Log in to your account and participate in the democratic process!
